rows.label: qev025109_MSG0001
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025109_MSG0002
rows.name: Oh no...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025109_MSG0003
rows.name:
She was always so so...warm, no?
Now she's as cold as frozen pizza.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025109_JNK0010
rows.name: Comfort

rows.label: qev025109_SEL0011
rows.name: Offer words of comfort to the grieving Ackwar.

rows.label: qev025109_JNK0020
rows.name: Respect

rows.label: qev025109_SEL0021
rows.name: Give Ackwar space to grieve in peace.

rows.label: qev025109_MSG0004
rows.name: You...you really are very very kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025109_MSG0005
rows.name: But I... I can't...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025109_MSG0006
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025109_MSG0007
rows.name:
We had a promise, Yuyu and me, you know?
We...we were going to make our own pizza.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025109_MSG0008
rows.name:
I even built an oven in my house.
I...I thought we...c-could...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025109_MSG0009
rows.name: But now... Nngh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025109_MSG0010
rows.name: ...It's a note, no? Maybe from whoever did this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025109_MSG0011
rows.name:
"Are you angry, little Ma-non? Bitter? Good.
Your hurt won't go away until the flames of hate
burn everything to ash."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025109_MSG0012
rows.name:
They... Whoever did this knew me, right?
They did this to Yuyu because of...me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025109_MSG0013
rows.name: I expect I'll be next, right? They clearly want me dead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025109_MSG0014
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025109_MSG0015
rows.name:
...They can come and and try me, can't they?
I'll end this. End them all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025109_MSG0016
rows.name:
I'm going to to to catch the bastard responsible,
and I'm going to kill them, aren't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025109_MSG0017
rows.name:
I'm headed back to the city. I need to start hunting
down the culprit, don't I? Yuyu, ah... She won't be
able to rest so long as this lunatic is out there, will she?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025109_MSG0018
rows.name:
...I think I may know who did this.
I just need to see what the forensics say, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025109_MSG0019
rows.name:
This isn't over until the one who murdered Yuyu pays,
but...I need to be sure, yes? Yes. Completely sure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025109_MSG0020
rows.name:
I'm headed back. If something happens to me, find my
co-worker, Jim, won't you? Talk to him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025109_MSG0021
rows.name: I'll be counting on your support, okay?[ST:wait ]
